text: @realDonaldTrump I rather have my loved ones safe at home till our country gets a better handle on coronavirus m. Please tell Republitards & Demonrats to get their act together & give $5K per family & 2 months of housing/apartment & car loan forgiveness. FYI: I’m #TeamMAGA! https://t.co/6gQ7i9Lfv9

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
